snap(10000,-99,-99)
sky(0,0,0)
ground(0,0,0)
fadefrom(0)
lights()
name(Death Pit)
nlaps(10)

set(47,0,0,-9000,0)

set(30,4000,-200,-9000,-90)
set(30,4000,1200,-9000,-90)
set(30,4000,2600,-9000,-90)
set(30,4000,4000,-9000,-90)
set(30,4000,5400,-9000,-90)

set(30,4000,13800,-9000,-90)

set(10,0,4000,-9000,0)p
set(10,0,9600,-9000,0)p
set(58,0,13600,-9000,45)p
chk(40,0,13600,-9000,0)
set(14,0,13600,-9000,-90)

set(10,-4500,13600,-9000,90)p

set(14,-14100,13600,-9000,0)

set(14,-14100,0,-9000,90)

set(10,-10100,0,-9000,90)p
set(10,-4500,0,-9000,90)p
set(58,0,0,-9000,-45)p

set(14,0,0,-9000,180)
